snippet.title: Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
What are you willing to risk for THE TRUTH?

Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help!

Free demo for our indie visual novel game out September 6, 2024.

🔗 Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2992580/Ventreville_A_Cure_for_Sorrow/

#gaming #gametrailers #games #indiegame #indiegames #visualnovel #indiedev #gamerelease #gametrailer #fandom #indiegamelover #booktok
